data.claim: Cognee is a knowledge engine for AI agent memory with 12.3k GitHub stars. Combines vector search + graph databases in 6 lines of code. Pipeline: add() -> cognify() -> memify() -> search(). Has research paper on optimizing knowledge graphs for LLM reasoning.
data.snippet: Knowledge Engine for AI Agent Memory in 6 lines of code. Combines vector search, graph databases and self-improvement.
